name: Lipan's Kinetic CD
description:
Album by Cranial Incisored
released by Hellavila Records (09-09-2009)
Enhanced CD, multimedia content (video clip, live, profile, etc).

“More variation between complex riffing and crushing blast beats makes CI's songwriting quality matches with their playing chops and create a new intensity into the metal scene. Sick!!!”
Eben / BURGERKILL

“The music is twisted with varied fusions between chaotic Grindcore guitar pummeling that has been broken into sudden wild dull razor against the scrotum shredding, clean diatonic harmony, and blatant noisy experimentation.”
Mike Lidia - Unholy Cult Webzine USA

“There are a multitude of ways in which music can be technical. Leading Indonesian brutality merchants Cranial Incisored explore the facets of riff fragmentation, rhythmic discontinuity and atonality, all within a matrix that feels very spontaneous and totally unorthodox.”
Mike Reeves - Diabolical Conquest Webzine USA

name: Rebuild:The Unfinished Interpretation of Irrational Behavior CD
description:
Cranial Incisored 
"Rebuild:The Unfinished Interpretation of Irrational Behavior" CD

released by Malicious Intent Recs USA (2006)

Cranial Incisored 1st album! 


“There are a multitude of ways in which music can be technical. Leading Indonesian brutality merchants Cranial Incisored explore the facets of riff fragmentation, rhythmic discontinuity and atonality, all within a matrix that feels very spontaneous and totally unorthodox.”
